titleStmt.title: Some remarks upon a speech made to the grand jury for the county of Middlesex concerning the execution of penalties upon the churches of Christ, which worship God in meeting-houses, for their so doing : and may serve for an answer to part of the order of the justices, Jan. 13 to the same purpose : in a letter to Sir W.S. their speaker.
titleStmt.author: J. W.
Smith, William, Sir, 1616 or 17-1696.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
